statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, energy_value FROM energy_usage WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_name, energy_value FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, timestamp FROM energy_usage WHERE facility_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT facility_name, energy_value FROM energy_usage WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY energy_value ASC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, energy_value, timestamp FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY facility_id;
SELECT facility_name, timestamp FROM energy_usage WHERE facility_name LIKE 'Facility%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM energy_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, energy_usage FROM energy_facilities ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT facility_name, energy_usage FROM energy_facilities WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT facility_name, usage FROM energy_data JOIN energy_facilities ON energy_data.facility_id = energy_facilities.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_facilities;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM energy_facilities WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_data WHERE facility_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT facility_id, SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_data GROUP BY facility_id HAVING total_usage > 500;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, timestamp, NOW()) AS hours_passed FROM energy_data WHERE facility_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_facilities;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM energy_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_metering WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM energy_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM energy_facilities INNER JOIN energy_users ON energy_facilities.facility_id = energy_users.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM energy_facilities WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY facility_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_metering WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM energy_users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_metering INNER JOIN energy_facilities ON energy_metering.facility_id = energy_facilities.facility_id WHERE facility_name='Solar Farm' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT user_id, username, email, energy_usage FROM energy_users INNER JOIN energy_metering ON energy_users.facility_id = energy_metering.facility_id WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM facility;
SELECT name FROM facility ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT building_id, name FROM building WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY building_id;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM room WHERE building_id = 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM facility WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, id FROM facility WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM building WHERE facility_id IN (SELECT id FROM facility WHERE name = 'ExampleFacility');
SELECT room.id, room.name, building_id, facility.name FROM room JOIN building ON room.building_id = building.id JOIN facility ON building.facility_id = facility.id;
SELECT room.name, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM room JOIN energy_usage ON room.id = energy_usage.room_id GROUP BY room.name HAVING total_energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility;
SELECT meter_id, meter_name, meter_type FROM energy_meter WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM energy_reading ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alert WHERE meter_id = 2;
SELECT facility_name, total_energy_usage, data_timestamp FROM dashboard_data WHERE total_energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT meter_name, meter_type FROM energy_meter WHERE facility_id = 2 ORDER BY meter_name ASC;
SELECT reading_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM energy_reading WHERE meter_id = 3;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alert WHERE meter_id = 4;
